page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There is one cinema within in the block. The most popular evening is a Friday. The cinema is within the { {Public Hall}building in Brynamman. Five people work within the hall itself. It is very difficult to keep the cinema open at times. But the hall is financed by the local miner's Welfare Fund. The hall itself is very important as it is the last in Britain to be financed in this way. The hall is also used for the{ {traditional Chapel Eisteddfod}every year and will be used in the future for the Welsh language{Drama Festival.
